description: Cracking piece of software! Found my Steam games right out of the box (and, with one console command that was well documented on the website, my Epic and GOG games too). Backed up my saves. I changed the number of full backups to 99 and now I effectively have save slots in games that don't support them.
summary: Adds multiple save slots to games that only have one

description: Works perfectly, and allows me to sync my game saves to OneDrive

I use it a lot to keep my savegames synced between a PC and my Steam Deck. Works very nice for most of the games (need a proper entry on PCGamingWiki) and is actively developed.

Disclaimer: I am contributing small bit to this project.
summary: Sync savegames between PC and Steam Deck just fine
